Examples¶

 1from molecular_simulations.build import ExplicitSolvent
 2from molecular_simulations.simulate import Simulator
 3from pathlib import Path
 4
 5input_pdb = Path('protein.pdb').resolve()
 6builder = ExplicitSolvent(input_pdb)
 7builder.build()
 8
 9sim = Simulator(builder.out, builder.out.with_suffix('.inpcrd'))
10sim.run()
